description:
The story revolves around Objects — powerful, massive weapons that change the course of warfare — and Elite Object pilots. An odd Elite girl named http://anidb.net/ch70490 [Milinda] meets http://anidb.net/ch70488 [Qwenthur], a student who aims to become an Object mechanic, with the soldier-in-training http://anidb.net/ch70489 [Heivia] on a snowy battlefield.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
The course of warfare has been altered by the invention of massive weapons platforms known as `Objects`, which have essentially rendered all conventional and even nuclear weapons obsolete. Warfare has become a cleaner affair and decided completely by Objects and their pilots.
Havia Winchell, a soldier-in-training and Quenthur Barbotage, a student studying to become an Object mechanic, are assigned to a military base in Alaska where an Object known as the Baby Magnum operates from. Sick of the terrible military rations, they go hunting, and Quenthur meets the Baby Magnum`s pilot, Miinda Brantini, whom he calls the `Princess`. She shares her misgivings with him, that she is piloting a first-generation general-purpose Object that is probably outclassed by the newer Objects that have been developed recently.
Havia and Quenthur watch in horror as the Baby Magnum is destroyed in an engagement with another Object.

titles.title: Ces simples soldats qui ligotent Gulliver. Bataille dans le froid de l`Alaska, partie 1
Gulliver o Shibaru Zouhyou-tachi: Alaska Gokkan Kankyou Setsujousen I
The Little Soldiers Who Tie Down Gulliver: The Snowy Deep Winter Battle of Alaska I
ガリバーを縛る雑兵たち アラスカ極寒環境雪上戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Under attack from an Object that is not observing the usual white flag protocol, Qwenthur must decide whether to run or go save the Princess.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ces simples soldats qui ligotent Gulliver. Bataille dans le froid de l`Alaska, partie 2
Gulliver o Shibaru Zouhyou-tachi: Alaska Gokkan Kankyou Setsujousen II
The Little Soldiers Who Tie Down Gulliver: The Snowy Deep Winter Battle of Alaska II
ガリバーを縛る雑兵たち アラスカ極寒環境雪上戦 II

REGULAR.description:
Determined to get revenge and buy time for the rest of their unit to evacuate, Qwenthur, Havia, and Milinda figure out the enemy`s weakness and hatch a plan to incapacitate the enemy Object.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ces simples soldats qui ligotent Gulliver. Bataille dans le froid de l`Alaska, partie 3
Gulliver o Shibaru Zouhyou-tachi: Alaska Gokkan Kankyou Setsujousen III
The Little Soldiers Who Tie Down Gulliver: The Snowy Deep Winter Battle of Alaska III
ガリバーを縛る雑兵たち アラスカ極寒環境雪上戦 III

REGULAR.description:
Having proven themselves uniquely capable of fighting Objects on their own, the military wastes no time in pitting Qwenthur and Havia up against another Object - this time, out at sea.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oyayubi Tom wa Yuden o Hashiru: Gibraltar Tsuukou Soshisen I
Tom Pouce dans le pétrole. La Bataille de Gibraltar, partie 1
Tom Thumb Races Through the Oil Field: The Battle of the Gibraltar Blockade I
親指トムは油田を走る ジブラルタル通行阻止戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and Havia bought time for Milinda`s Baby Magnum against the Tri-Core, but when things start to look dicey for Milinda, Qwenthur has to decide whether he wants to try his luck against this Object yet again.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oyayubi Tom wa Yuden o Hashiru: Gibraltar Tsuukou Soshisen II
Tom Pouce dans le pétrole. La Bataille de Gibraltar, partie 2
Tom Thumb Races Through the Oil Field: The Battle of the Gibraltar Blockade II
親指トムは油田を走る ジブラルタル通行阻止戦 II

REGULAR.description:
For once, Qwenthur and Havia are sent to a battlefront where the odds seem stacked in their favor. Their side has twenty first and second gen Objects, while their enemy has one measly 0.5th gen Object.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ari to Kirigirisu no Sensou: Oceania Gunji Kuni Kouryakusen I
La guerre de la cigale et la fourmi. L`état militaire d`Océanie, partie 1
The War of the Ant and the Grasshopper: The Invasion of the Oceanian Military State I
蟻とキリギリスの戦争 オセアニア軍事国攻略戦 I

REGULAR.description:
The race is on to find the Oceanian 0.5th gen Object before it is deployed to commit atrocities.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ari to Kirigirisu no Sensou: Oceania Gunji Kuni Kouryakusen II
La guerre de la cigale et la fourmi. L`état militaire d`Océanie, partie 2
The War of the Ant and the Grasshopper: The Invasion of the Oceanian Military State II
蟻とキリギリスの戦争 オセアニア軍事国攻略戦 II

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and Havia`s unconventional success against Objects is upsetting the status quo, and they discover that this has won them a powerful enemy, right as they are working to thwart the 0.5th gen.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ari to Kirigirisu no Sensou: Oceania Gunji Kuni Kouryakusen III
La guerre de la cigale et la fourmi. L`état militaire d`Océanie, partie 3
The War of the Ant and the Grasshopper: The Invasion of the Oceanian Military State III
蟻とキリギリスの戦争 オセアニア軍事国攻略戦 III

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and Havia find themselves in Antarctica, tracking down some terrorists. And it turns out that Havia is trying to win a name for himself for a lot more than just his family estate.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: In an Obstacle Course Race, It`s Normal to Get Covered in Mud: The Battle for Supremacy in Antarctica
Les courses d`obstacles sont toujours salissantes. La bataille pour l`Antarctique
Shougaibutsukyousou Nara Futsuu wa Doro Mamire: Nankyokutairiku Seiatsusen
障害物競走なら普通は泥まみれ 南極大陸制圧戦

REGULAR.description:
The entire battalion is off in pursuit of the terrorists and the mystery Object from Antarctica, which leads them across the sea to South America.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L`escalade à trois jambes est bien périlleuse. Bataille d`artillerie à Iguazú, partie 1
Nininsankyaku Tozan wa Inochigake de: Iguazu Sangaku Hougekisen I
Three-Legged Mountain-Climbing Is Life-and-Death: The Artillery Battle in the Iguazu Mountains I
二人三脚登山は命懸けで イグアス山岳砲撃戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and Havia`s battalion makes a successful amphibious landing, but they soon discover that the Mass Driver Conglomerate has been putting its technological prowess to good use when it comes to arming its Object.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L`escalade à trois jambes est bien périlleuse. Bataille d`artillerie à Iguazú, partie 2
Nininsankyaku Tozan wa Inochigake de: Iguazu Sangaku Hougekisen II
Three-Legged Mountain-Climbing Is Life-and-Death: The Artillery Battle in the Iguazu Mountains II
二人三脚登山は命懸けで イグアス山岳砲撃戦 II

REGULAR.description:
The remnants of the Bright Hopper`s battalion want to wreak havoc in revenge, heedless of civilian casualties. Qwenthur and Havia resolve to stop them, while also working on a plan to destroy the enemy Object.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L`escalade à trois jambes est bien périlleuse. Bataille d`artillerie à Iguazú, partie 3
Nininsankyaku Tozan wa Inochigake de: Iguazu Sangaku Hougekisen III
Three-Legged Mountain-Climbing Is Life-and-Death: The Artillery Battle in the Iguazu Mountains III
二人三脚登山は命懸けで イグアス山岳砲撃戦 III

REGULAR.description:
Working to mop up the survivors of the Mass Driver Foundation, the Baby Magnum limps into battle without the chance to make any repairs, relying somewhat more heavily than usual on boots on the ground.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: En joutes équestres, visez les pieds. Guerre totale à Amazon City, partie 1
In a Cavalry Battle, Knock Down the Foothold: The All-Out War in Amazon City I
Kibasen wa Ashimoto o Kuzusubeshi: Amazon City Souryokusen I
騎馬戦は足元を崩すべし アマゾンシティ総力戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and the Baby Magnum scramble to destroy the Mass Driver Foundation`s rail gun emplacement. And the infamous Sladder Honeysuckle makes an appearance.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: En joutes équestres, visez les pieds. Guerre totale à Amazon City, partie 2
In a Cavalry Battle, Knock Down the Foothold: The All-Out War in Amazon City II
Kibasen wa Ashimoto o Kuzusubeshi: Amazon City Souryokusen II
騎馬戦は足元を崩すべし アマゾンシティ総力戦 II

REGULAR.description:
The scattered wreckage of the Water Strider that Qwenthur and Havia blew up some time ago is now a treasure trove of intel on the enemy. But with another party trying to horn in on the prize, they have been ordered to do something about it.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Junk no Haka wa Rare Metal no Yama: Alaska Senjougo Geigekisen I
Les débris sont des montagnes d`or. Contre-attaque pour les restes de la bataille d`Alaska, partie 1
The Graveyard of Junk Is a Mountain of Rare Metals: Interception at the Site of the Alaska Battle I
ジャンクの墓はレアメタルの山 アラスカ戦場跡迎撃戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Leaping into the Rush in an attempt to buy Milinda more time to repair her Baby Magnum, Qwenthur learns some unexpected things about the Intelligence Union`s Object and its Elite pilot.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Junk no Haka wa Rare Metal no Yama: Alaska Senjougo Geigekisen II
Les débris sont des montagnes d`or. Contre-attaque pour les restes de la bataille d`Alaska, partie 2
The Graveyard of Junk Is a Mountain of Rare Metals: Interception at the Site of the Alaska Battle II
ジャンクの墓はレアメタルの山 アラスカ戦場跡迎撃戦 II

REGULAR.description:
The 37th Mechanized Maintenance Battalion gears up to launch a sneak attack at night against the Faith Organization in a complicated multi-step operation.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Satsutaba no Chirabaru Tankou: Kamchatka Hantou Yakan Kishou Dengekisen I
The Coal Mine Littered with Stacks of Money: The Kamchatka Peninsula Nighttime Blitz I
Une mine de charbon pleine de liasses de billets. Blitzkrieg nocturne sur la péninsule du Kamtchatka, partie 1
札束の散らばる炭鉱 カムチャッカ半島夜間奇襲電撃戦 I

REGULAR.description:
When a member of the team turns traitor, the operation is derailed. Qwenthur and Charlotte go on the run in hostile territory, while Havia`s team comes up against the enemy Object.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Satsutaba no Chirabaru Tankou: Kamchatka Hantou Yakan Kishou Dengekisen II
The Coal Mine Littered with Stacks of Money: The Kamchatka Peninsula Nighttime Blitz II
Une mine de charbon pleine de liasses de billets. Blitzkrieg nocturne sur la péninsule du Kamtchatka, partie 2
札束の散らばる炭鉱 カムチャッカ半島夜間奇襲電撃戦 II

REGULAR.description:
With help from an unexpected quarter, Qwenthur and Havia work together to neutralize Nutsray, the traitor, and the enemy Object, the Wing Balancer.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Satsutaba no Chirabaru Tankou: Kamchatka Hantou Yakan Kishou Dengekisen III
The Coal Mine Littered with Stacks of Money: The Kamchatka Peninsula Nighttime Blitz III
Une mine de charbon pleine de liasses de billets. Blitzkrieg nocturne sur la péninsule du Kamtchatka, partie 3
札束の散らばる炭鉱 カムチャッカ半島夜間奇襲電撃戦 III

REGULAR.description:
Three Legitimate Kingdom Objects set out on an operation to stop the traitorous Indigo Plasma from reaching their homeland.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L’honneur n’a pas de prix. Interception d`urgence sur l`île Victoria, partie 1
Meiyo ni Nedan wa Tsukerarenai: Victoria Tou Kinkyuu Tsuigekisen I
You Can`t Put a Price on Honor: The Critical Running Battle on Victoria Island I
名誉に値段はつけられない ビクトリア島緊急追撃戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Now facing seven Objects, including the Indigo Plasma, and with only a semi-damaged Baby Magnum on their side, Qwenthur and Havia try to figure out if this is a battle they can fight and win.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L’honneur n’a pas de prix. Interception d`urgence sur l`île Victoria, partie 2
Meiyo ni Nedan wa Tsukerarenai: Victoria Tou Kinkyuu Tsuigekisen II
You Can`t Put a Price on Honor: The Critical Running Battle on Victoria Island II
名誉に値段はつけられない ビクトリア島緊急追撃戦 II

REGULAR.description:
With the help of mercenaries, Qwenthur and Havia work to discover and exploit the weaknesses of the six dummy Objects to keep them from blowing up the immigrant settlement city.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L’honneur n’a pas de prix. Interception d`urgence sur l`île Victoria, partie 3
Meiyo ni Nedan wa Tsukerarenai: Victoria Tou Kinkyuu Tsuigekisen III
You Can`t Put a Price on Honor: The Critical Running Battle on Victoria Island III
名誉に値段はつけられない ビクトリア島緊急追撃戦 III

REGULAR.description:
What begins as a routine political hostage exchange turns into a hairy situation when the Baby Magnum suddenly becomes unreachable out in the field.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Requiem for the Flowers Blooming in the Field: The Battle to Destroy the Baby Magnum I
Le glas de la fleur des champs. Plan pour la destruction de Baby Magnum, partie 1
No ni Saku Hana ni Chinkon no Uta o: Baby Magnum Hakaisen I
野に咲く花に鎮魂の歌を ベイビーマグナム破壊戦 I

REGULAR.description:
Qwenthur and Havia find themselves working with unlikely allies as they try to prevent Milinda and the Baby Magnum from getting themselves killed or starting the next world war.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Requiem for the Flowers Blooming in the Field: The Battle to Destroy the Baby Magnum II
Le glas de la fleur des champs. Plan pour la destruction de Baby Magnum, partie 2
No ni Saku Hana ni Chinkon no Uta o: Baby Magnum Hakaisen II
野に咲く花に鎮魂の歌を ベイビーマグナム破壊戦 II
Episode S1
Tokubetsu Hen: Dai 37 Kidou Seihi Daitai - Sakusen Kiroku
特別編 ~第37機動整備大隊 作戦記録~
